function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Preprints with questionable or fraudulent information being used to support ineffective treatments","Impact":"Potential harm to patients, wasted resources, and delayed use of effective treatments","Mitigation":"Strict screening measures for preprints, including verification and validation of findings before dissemination","Technologies":"Digital screening tools, AI algorithms for fraud detection","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Preprint servers, regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Misleading or incorrect preprints leading to the dissemination of unreliable information","Impact":"Misinformation can lead to incorrect treatment decisions, public panic, and mistrust in scientific research","Mitigation":"Verification of preprint data, transparent communication of findings, and clear disclaimers on the status of preprints","Technologies":"Data verification tools, communication platforms for transparent sharing","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Researchers, preprint servers, scientific journals"},{"Description":"Rapid dissemination of preprints without critical review or verification","Impact":"Potential for harmful treatments being implemented based on incomplete or unreliable information","Mitigation":"Establishment of clear evaluation criteria for preprints, promotion of peer review and feedback processes","Technologies":"Peer-review platforms, collaboration tools for feedback and discussion","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Scientific journals, preprint servers, research institutions"}]}
